languages.text: Имя Иако Сотнего, также известного как Комиссар, дезертира, предателя и лжеца, на склоне жизненного пути все же обретшего раскаяние и павшего во имя Императора, не было забыто. В друзианских проповедях его приводили в пример, что даже гнуснейшая душа способна на очистительный поступок. Полк Веккентийских зуавов почтил его подвиг, назвав его именем штрафное подразделение приговоренных к смерти в битве преступников.
languages.translation_comment: Комиссар героически погиб на арене в конце главы

languages.text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.
languages.original_text: Имя Иако Сотнего, также известного как Комиссар, дезертира, предателя и лжеца, на склоне жизненного пути все же обретшего раскаяние и павшего во имя Императора, не было забыто. В друзианских проповедях его приводили в пример, что даже гнуснейшая душа способна на очистительный поступок. Полк Веккентийских зуавов почтил его подвиг, назвав его именем штрафное подразделение приговоренных к смерти в битве преступников.

traits.locale_text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers used him as an example, saying that even the most vile soul is capable of the purifying act. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming a penal unit of criminals convicted to death in battle after him.

Drusian preachers used him as an example, saying that even the most vile soul is capable of the purifying act. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming a penal unit of criminals convicted to death in battle after him.

Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.

languages.text: 伊科·索蒂尼，也就是被称为“政委”的那个人，尽管他是个叛徒、骗子，但他在生命的尽头寻得了救赎，以帝皇之名死去，被人们所铭记。德鲁苏斯布道士将他作为典范，宣传即便是最邪恶的灵魂也可以得到净化。为了纪念他的英雄事迹，维肯迪安·苏亚维军团以他的名字命名了一支判罪军团，军团中所有囚徒都可以通过战死沙场来偿清罪孽。
languages.original_text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.

traits.locale_text: 伊科·索蒂尼，也就是被称为“政委”的那个人，尽管他是个叛徒、骗子，但他在生命的尽头寻得了救赎，以帝皇之名死去，被人们所铭记。德鲁苏斯布道士将他作为典范，宣传即便是最邪恶的灵魂也可以得到净化。为了纪念他的英雄事迹，维肯迪安·苏亚维军团以他的名字命名了一支判罪军团，军团中所有士兵都可以通过战死沙场来偿清罪孽。

languages.text: Der Name Iako Sotniy, besser bekannt als der Kommissar, geriet nicht in Vergessenheit. Der Verräter und Lügner tat am Ende seines Lebens Buße und starb im Namen des Imperators. Prediger des Drusian nutzten ihn als Beispiel dafür, dass selbst die schändlichste Seele noch geläutert werden kann. Das Regiment von Vickentian Zouaves ehrte seine Taten. Man benannte eine Strafeinheit aus Gefangenen nach ihm, die zum Tod in der Schlacht verurteilt worden waren.
languages.original_text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.

traits.locale_text: Der Name Iako Sotniy, besser bekannt als der Kommissar, geriet nicht in Vergessenheit. Der Verräter und Lügner tat am Ende seines Lebens Buße und starb im Namen des Imperators. Prediger des Drusian nutzten ihn als Beispiel dafür, dass selbst die schändlichste Seele noch geläutert werden kann. Das Regiment von Vickentian Zouaves ehrte seine Taten. Man benannte eine Strafeinheit aus Gefangenen nach ihm, die zum Tod in der Schlacht verurteilt worden waren.

languages.text: Iako Sotniy, également nommé « le commissaire », entra dans l'Histoire comme le traître et le menteur qui s'était repenti et avait donné sa vie pour l'Empereur. Les prêcheurs drusiens le présentaient comme un exemple démontrant que même l'âme la plus abjecte pouvait être purifiée. Le régiment des Zouaves vickentiens honora sa mémoire en donnant son nom à une unité pénitentiaire condamnée à mourir au combat.
languages.original_text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.

traits.locale_text: Iako Sotniy, également nommé « le commissaire », entra dans l’Histoire comme le traître et le menteur qui s'était repenti et avait donné sa vie pour l'Empereur. Les prêcheurs drusiens le présentaient comme un exemple démontrant que même l'âme la plus abjecte pouvait être purifiée. Le régiment des Zouaves vickentiens honora sa mémoire en donnant son nom à une unité pénale condamnée à mourir au combat.

languages.text: El nombre de Iako Sotniy, también conocido como el Comisario, el traidor y mentiroso que encontró el arrepentimiento en sus últimos días y murió por el Emperador, no cayó en el olvido. Los predicadores drusianos lo recordaron como ejemplo de que incluso el alma más vil puede ser purificada. El regimiento de los Zuavos Vickentianos honraron su gesta nombrando en su honor a una unidad penal condenada a la muerte en batalla.
languages.original_text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.

traits.locale_text: El nombre de Iako Sotniy, también conocido como el Comisario, el traidor y mentiroso que encontró el arrepentimiento en sus últimos días y murió por el Emperador, no cayó en el olvido. Los predicadores drusianos lo recordaron como ejemplo de que incluso el alma más vil puede ser purificada. El regimiento de los Zuavos Vickentianos honraron su gesta concediendo su nombre a una unidad penal condenada a la muerte en batalla.

languages.text: イアコ・ソトニー、またの名をコミッサーとして知られ、裏切り者で嘘つきだったが、人生の終わりに悔い改め、皇帝の名の下で死んだことのは忘れ去られなかった。ドルスス教のプリーチャーたちは、彼を模範として掲げ、最も卑劣な魂でさえも浄化されると語った。ヴィケンチアン・ズアベス連隊は、戦死を宣告された囚人からなる流刑部隊に彼の名を冠することで、彼の行いを称えた。
languages.original_text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.

traits.locale_text: イアコ・ソトニー、またの名をコミッサーとして知られ、裏切り者で嘘つきだったが、人生の終わりに悔い改め、皇帝の名の下で死んだことのは忘れ去られなかった。ドルスス教のプリーチャーたちは、彼を模範として掲げ、最も卑劣な魂でさえも浄化されると語った。ヴィケンチアン・ズアベス連隊は、戦死を宣告された流刑部隊に彼の名を冠することで、彼の行いを称えた。

languages.text: Bir hain ve bir yalancıyken ömrünün sonunda tövbe etmiş ve İmparator adına canını vermiş İako Sotniy'in, namıdiğer Komiser'in adı unutulmadı. Drususçu vaizler onu, en habis ruhun bile arındırılabileceği konusunda bir örnek olarak gösterdi. Vickentian Zouaves yönetimi, muharebede ölme cezası almış bir mahkûm birliğine adını vererek onu onurlandırdı.
languages.original_text: The name of Iako Sotniy, also known as the Commissar, a traitor and a liar who found repentance at the end of his life and died in the name of the Emperor, was not forgotten. Drusian preachers held him up as an example, saying that even the most vile soul can be purified. The regiment of the Vickentian Zouaves honoured his deed by naming after him a penal unit of prisoners sentenced to death in battle.

traits.locale_text: Bir hain ve bir yalancıyken ömrünün sonunda tövbe etmiş ve İmparator adına canını vermiş İako Sotniy'in, namıdiğer Komiser'in adı unutulmadı. Drususçu vaizler onu, en habis ruhun bile arındırılabileceği konusunda bir örnek olarak gösterdi. Vickentian Zouaves yönetimi, muharebede ölme cezası almış bir mahkûm birliğine adını vererek onu onurlandırdı.
